fullplot: Ava Dopkins is recovering from demonic possession. With no memory of the past month, she is forced to attend a Spirit Possessions Anonymous support group. As she navigates this new world, Ava must reconnect with her friends, get her job back, and figure out whose blood created the huge stain in her apartment. Ava's life was hijacked by a demon, now it's time to get it back.
plot: A young woman recovers from a demonic possession.
title: Ava's Possessions
